author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Messe Berlin: Supervisory board agrees early renewal of contract with CEO Dr. Christian GokeTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Messe Berlin: Supervisory board agrees early renewal of contract with CEO Dr. Christian Goke Published on : Tuesday, September 15, 2015
At its regular meeting on 14 September the supervisory board of Messe Berlin agreed an early renewal of the contract with Dr. Christian Göke (50), CEO of Messe Berlin. The original contract was due to expire in 2016. As chief executive officer Dr. Göke has been head of Messe Berlin since 1 July 2013.
Peter Zühlsdorff, chairman of the supervisory board of Messe Berlin: “The supervisory board is extremely satisfied with the company’s economic performance and Dr. Christian Göke’s leadership. For this reason, and in recognition of his outstanding achievements, the supervisory board and the representatives of the shareholders have agreed an early renewal of Dr. Christian Göke’s contract.“
